column1: * Note that a رغيف refers to something different than what Americans would typically think of as a loaf of bread. A رغيف is a whole pita bread or عيش بلدي. Here's a photo of a boy carrying a bunch of أرغفة.

column2: thin bread roll (similar to hot dog buns)

column1: a round bread roll (like dinner rolls)
to go sour (of food or milk etc.)
